mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_COMPANY, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{company}, #{id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE1, USER_PHONE2, USER_PHONE3, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_COMPANY, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{inputId}
